usbsimulator.signal.noise module

usbsimulator.signal.noise.f(signal: list[float])[source]

Function to simulate noise on the USB Bus. This is used in the CTF challenge, but might not be representative of the reality.

Parameters:

signal (list[float]) – the signal to apply the noise on

Returns:

the noisy signal

Return type:

list[float]
